title: LAST MILE ASEAN CONFERENCE & EXPO
description: ASEAN’s Leading B2B Ecommerce, Logistics, Retail and Packaging, Supply Chain and Distribution Conference & Expo ASEAN’s Leading B2B Ecommerce, Logistics, Retail and Packaging, Supply Chain and Distribution Conference & Expo 5th annual Last Mile ASEAN- Conference & Expo (LMA), powered by E-Commerce Logistics Show will take place on 01 and 02 March 2022 at BITEC in Bangkok. Last Mile ASEAN is a platform to give voice to intricate matters of Delivery and Fulfillment Logistics covering supply Chain, operations, e-commerce, logistics, post and parcel for multichannel retail industry. The event will focus on how retailers and pure-players can transform their e-commerce operations to respond to the market growth and reach their customers as quickly and cost-efficiently as possible. It also aims at creating better understanding of the last mile fragment’s opportunities & challenges in running cross border last mile delivery business. The event will immerse you in 2 days of inspiration, learning and networking with over 400 industry experts from leading e-Commerce, retail, postal operators, courier & express companies and fulfillment & logistics companies to debate current issues and form business relationships on a global scale. The Last Mile ASEAN is dedicated to the professional ecommerce, online and offline retailers, delivery and fulfillment community. Organizer: Manch Exhibitions (Thailand) Co., Ltd More Details : www.LastMileAsean.com
